Summary: Glowing orb in front of commercial jet
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Cottonwood
There were no other sightings in Cottonwood on or around November 8th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsBought a new digital camera (SLR) to photograph what we have photographed in the past and was taking pictures of aircraft in the area and zoomed in on a commercial aircraft to see a glowing orb in the path of the jet and then later next to it and then later in the commtrails. So I took several pictures approximately four and the camera auto focused and I lost the object. Approximately 10 minutes later I saw the glowing orb and took a couple photos of it heading in a different direction and approximately 5 minutes later 3 military F-16 jets flew overhead on the same flight path as the commercial jetliner.
